title: Retro Game Chiptune Asset Pack
description: Chiptune music pack just like on old consoles
longDescription:
LISTEN TO ALL TRACKS HERE


This music pack contains 23 original retro tracks looped in the style of old consoles. The recording was made respecting the timbre characteristics of old consoles. The pack includes battle songs, adventure songs, sad and happy themes, menu songs, medieval themes, victory themes, themes that can be used in water levels, and more. Some songs have more than one, with or without an introduction, for example.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 23

Number of Audio Cues: 23

Sample rate/bit rate: 44.1 Hz/16-bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 23:30

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: www.rafaeltorres.mus.br

Important/Additional Notes: This file works on Unreal Engine version 4.17 or higher.
